qn3a_dat_proc¶

Preprocess the optical digit data.

@author: Bhishan Poudel

@date: Nov 16, 2017

To run this progam we need train and test data for optical digits from the website:

http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Optical+Recognition+of+Handwritten+Digits

The two datafiles optdigits.tes and optdigits.tes should be in the path ../data/optdigits/

qn3a_dat_proc.main()[source]¶
qn3a_dat_proc.split_devel_train(fdata, fdevel, ftrain)[source]¶
qn3a_dat_proc.split_to10(fdata)[source]¶

X_norm = X - X_min / (X_max - X_min)

Min is calculated for a column by default.
